bt.service

Interface IRuntimeLifecycleBinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RuntimeLifecycleBinder

    public interface IRuntimeLifecycleBinder
    Application lifecycle management API. Provides hooks for all major types of lifecycle events. All thread workers and executors must be registered via this service.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IRuntimeLifecycleBinder.LifecycleEvent
      Lifecycle events
